Welcome to

Stamford

We are thrilled to invite you to experience our town's rich history, friendly people, and exciting events. From the beautiful downtown Square, to our fishing and hunting opportunities, local entertainment options, and our amazing school district, Stamford has something for everyone. Whether you're a lifelong resident or a first-time visitor, we hope you enjoy all that Stamford has to offer. Thank you for visiting our town and we hope you'll come back soon!

Learn more

This is Home.

Stamford, Texas is located 40 miles north of Abilene in the Texas Big Country. Nestled just off of Highway 277, our town is home to close to 3000 people who are proud of our community, schools, businesses, and culture. We pride ourselves in being the home of where the Old West meets the Modern Frontier a perfect blend of historical appreciation and modern innovation.

00:00
00:29
% buffered00:00

Make Stamford Home

Learn about what makes Stamford a great place to live, and what you need to know when moving to town.

Learn more

Visit Stamford

From the annual Texas Cowboy Reunion, to Lake Stamford, to learning our history at the Museum of the West Texas Frontier, or catching a show at the Historic Grand Theatre, Stamford has a lot to offer! Click below for more information about motels and leisure activities.

Plan Your Visit

Shop Stamford

Stamford is a hub for local entrepreneurs and thriving small businesses. From large corporate enterprises to local, homemade products Stamford has it all.

Shop Stamford Businesses

Community Events

  • Texas Cowboy Reunion

    July 1 - 5, 2025 - For information about tickets, event registration schedule and more, visit the TCR website.

    Visit the TCR Website

  • Best of Stamford

    Saturday, February 7, 2025 at the Old Timers Round Up Hall

    Hosted by the Stamford Chamber of Commerce, this annual event celebrates Stamford with an evening of community fun.

    Click here for info!

  • Community Easter Event

    Harmon Park

    Join us for a morning of fun, free pancakes, and tons of Easter Eggs!

    Details coming soon

  • Fall Festival

    October 25th, 2025

    12pm-4pm TCR Rodeo Grounds

    2025 Details
Item 1 of 4

City Notice:

September 11, 2024

City of Stamford ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE.


THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISED BY 3.50 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $-53.25.

Contact Us

City of Stamford - 325-773-2723 or 325-773-2591

Chamber of Commerce - 325-773-2411

Development Corporation - 325-773-2495
